723451f-a.text:
63-65-67 Suffolk Street, at, and adjoining the N.W. corner of Broome Street. Also shown are Nos. 196-198 Broome Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Suffolk Street. Nos. 63 Suffolk and 196 Broome Streets, is the same building, and has a frontage'or 52.6 feet on Suffolk and only 25 feet
on Broome Streets.
January 1916.
